description:
have to use the Terminal to install with: 
sudo apt install lazarus-ide

and accept a blank/default configuration ....

This is really about the installer. Overall a brilliant product in Windows and earlier Ubuntu versions, but almost impossible to get installed and running in Ubuntu 22.04. Was simple in Ubuntu 16.04 but after upgrading and re-installing Lazarus/FPC I cand even edit or save the examples. Something about permissions but the installer should handle that. Going back to Ubuntu 16.04 for my sanity.
summary: Defective installer. Very difficult to install

description: Download from https://www.lazarus-ide.org/ to try it
summary: Good Software but instaler not working

description: j'aime lazarus mais l'instalation sous xubuntu manque de sérieux

C'est bien de critiquer Windows, mais franchement sous ubuntu c'est pas mal non plus. Je dirai carrément minable.
Meme message que yannick.
не работает Can't find the lazarus executable /usr/lib/lazarus/2.2.0/lazarus
